message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe we can reach a better agreement. I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is simply too low for me. Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $10,500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to come down to $10,800. This is a good deal for both of us, considering the value of the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to propose a price of $10,600 for the product.
